title: PERMANENTLY BANNED FOR NOTHING
body:
I got banned for nothing in my vayne game that i played relly badly because i just woke up! They reported me for flaming (9x reports witch i didn't do). I got really upset because thets my main account. Our yasuo flamed me for whole game with akali ekko and yi. Enemy team said "Report vayne toxic". I wans't toxic i was just upset about things that my team and enemy team said to me. My yi got autofilled in support and he trollpick yi. I said i dont wanna play bot with trollpick and that i will troll. I trolled for 30 seconds and i told yi "if you stop taking my farm i will stop trolling" but he said no. I wanted from us to comebac and i started farming while enemy is engaging on our turrets and ekko suddenly and steal all of my farm and i warnd him with "ekko!!!" and he just tipe in chat like this "hahahah noob". Enemy fiora flamed me a lot but i don't wanna repport anybody because i am team player and i am good! Please riot remove my ban off my account. I think you should do it. Riot employes id you have something to say feel free to  ask me down below. My accout name is M2saKrs.

Peter (15)

replies.body:
>I said i dont wanna play bot with trollpick and that i will troll. I trolled for 30 seconds and i told yi "if you stop taking my farm i will stop trolling"

Then the ban is completely deserved. I have zero sympathy for trolling. 


Edit:
I also took a look at your game, and I doubt very much that you only trolled for 30 sec.

You had a score of 0/21/4, you were dying every time you re-spawned up until 20min, and at the 20min mark you only had 7cs.

Your punishment is about your behavior, no one else's.

If I was picking an off-meta support and my lane-partner said that they would troll (and followed through), I would take the CS as well. An intentional feeder is not going to make good use of the CS.
